thread.section_title: Wilson Amplifiers Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Wilson Amplifiers | wilsonamplifiers.com | 3 of 68
thread.title: Mark Hall
thread.title_full: Wilson Amplifiers reviewed by Mark Hall

author: Mark Hall
title: Mark Hall
text:
After spending a few minutes chatting with a rep from Wilson I decided to try the cell phone amp that was recommended by him. So glad that I did !! Now I can use my cell phone here at home with out the calls dropping, increased my signal quite a bit !!!
I have already recommended Wilson Amplifiers to several people.
They were very helpful and the shipping was fast 3 day to Pa. from Texas.
Thanks, I am very satisfied
